snippet: Luis Ortiz, the Brooklyn man who the authorities say fired a gun at a police officer, striking him behind the right ear, was indicted on a charge of first-degree attempted murder.
abstract: Luis Ortiz, who the authorities say fired a gun at a New York City Police Officer Kevin Brennan during confrontation in Brooklyn housing project, striking him behind the right ear, is indicted on a charge of first-degree attempted murder.
lead_paragraph: Luis Ortiz, the Brooklyn man who the authorities say fired a gun at a police officer, striking him behind the right ear, was indicted on a charge of first-degree attempted murder.

headline.seo: Suspect in Brooklyn Officer’s Shooting Is Indicted
headline.main: Suspect in Officer’s Point-Blank Shooting Is Indicted on Attempted-Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Officer’s Point-Blank Shooting Is Indicted on Attempted-Murder Charge
